title: Modern engines and energy conversion. - rev. ed.
brief_description: Explains the various types of engines which convert fuel to useful energy. Analyses the heat cycle of reciprocating turbine and rocket engines. Introduces the nuclear power engine, the ion engine and solar satellites. Suitable for middle secondary level.
